      • editOrder

        private void editOrder()
        Edit Order option This method will request an order number and provide you the relevant edit order page if available If the order is already paid or does not exist, an error message will appear and you will exit back to the Order Menu

      • findOrder

        @Nullable
private @Nullable Order findOrder(int id,
                                            boolean allowFromPaid)
        Finds an order from its Order ID
        Parameters:
        id - Order ID to find
        allowFromPaid - Whether to check from the Paid Orders. Note that those orders cannot be edited
        Returns:
        An order object if found, null otherwise

      • getOrderItemToEdit

        private int getOrderItemToEdit(@NotNull
                               @NotNull Order o,
                               String prompt)
        Gets the list of item from the order and request the user to enter the ID of the item they are selecting
        Parameters:
        o - Order object
        prompt - The prompt to prompt the user. If no prompt pass in an empty string
        Returns:
        the ID of the item they are selecting (based against the arraylist index, NOT the order item's respective ID

      • printOrderItems

        public static void printOrderItems(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull ArrayList<OrderItem> items,
                                   boolean prettyPrint)
        Prints the list of items in the order
        Parameters:
        items - An array list of the items in the order
        prettyPrint - Whether or not we should format the string (for displaying in a table format) or as a list format
